query.value:
SELECT 
Account_18chr_Id__c,
Account_Number__c,
Name,
OwnerId,
Country__c,
CreatedDate,
LastModifiedDate
FROM Account

where CreatedDate >@{activity('Get Last Created Record').output.firstRow.Created}Z OR  LastModifiedDate >@{activity('Get Last Modified Record').output.firstRow.Modified}Z

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select max(cast (Lastmodifieddate AS datetime)) AS Modified
  FROM [STG].[Marketing_SFDC_Account]

select max(cast (createddate AS datetime))  AS Created
  FROM [STG].[Marketing_SFDC_Account]

FROM Account

SELECT 
AccountId,
ContactId18__c,
Contact_Name__c,
Contact_Type__c,
CreatedDate,
Salutation,
FirstName,
LastName,
Title,
LeadSource,
Email,
OwnerId,
LastModifiedDate
FROM Contact 


where CreatedDate >@{activity('Get Last Created Record').output.firstRow.Created}Z OR  LastModifiedDate >@{activity('Get Last Modified Record').output.firstRow.Modified}Z

query.value:
SELECT 
AccountId,
ContactId18__c,
Contact_Name__c,
Contact_Type__c,
CreatedDate,
Salutation,
FirstName,
LastName,
Title,
LeadSource,
Email,
OwnerId,
LastModifiedDate
FROM Contact

SELECT 
Lead_18chr_Id__c,
MQL_Datestamp__c,
MTL_Datestamp__c,
SQL_Datestamp__c,
Status,
Company,
Lead_Country__c,
Title,
FirstName,
LastName,
Email,
MQL_Program__c,
Qualified_Out_Reason__c,
Status_Reason__c,
Sales_Region__c,
Sub_Region__c,
ConvertedAccountId,
ConvertedContactId,
CreatedDate,
OwnerID,
ConvertedOpportunityId,
LastModifiedDate

FROM Lead
where 
MQL_Datestamp__c!= null or
MTL_Datestamp__c!= null

where CreatedDate >@{activity('Get Last Created Record').output.firstRow.Created}Z OR  LastModifiedDate >@{activity('Get Last Modified Record').output.firstRow.Modified}Z

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select max(cast (Lastmodifieddate AS datetime)) AS Modified
  FROM [STG].[Marketing_SFDC_Lead]

select max(cast (createddate AS datetime))  AS Created
  FROM [STG].[Marketing_SFDC_Lead]
